title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and tool use.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Node & browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, RAG, and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing sync/async APIs, streaming, and tool calls.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with chat history, model switching, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, tool use, RAG, and deployment patterns.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that can plug into an Ollama backend for local model serving.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert any HuggingFace GGUF model into an Ollama Modfile and push to registry.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Production-ready multi-arch Docker images with CUDA & ROCm variants.
